label: faxCommunication
comment: Facsimile communication information for this contact person.
Fax communication information for this location party.
Fax communication information for this trade contact.

rangeIncludes.comment: Information necessary to establish an electronic telecommunication connection for the purpose of a telephone or facsimile exchange.

domainIncludes.comment: A person or department that acts as a point of contact with another person or department.
An individual human being in a position to give assistance or information.
An individual, a group, or a body having a role related to a location.
